Book With Peace Of Mind

Read through our verified reviews to see what past travellers experienced dealing with us.

"The Secret Namibia Team was amazing to work with, giving us a memorable journey throughout Namibia!"

We gave Chrizell a tall task in planning our self drive Namibia trip. She was quick to connect with us and was thorough in understanding our travel requests, as well as lodging requirements. We were late in our request, but somehow, she was able to put together an amazing trip that had all the key places we wanted. The cost she gave us was very reasonable, and the payment process was very easy to complete (not always so easy with African vendors). We received an initial itinerary that we adjusted a couple of times (due to our requests), and Chrizell and Johan sent us updated agendas as the day approached. We were all set!

When we arrived in Windhoek, we were met in the airport by Secret Namibia, and given a packet with maps, hotel vouchers, some animal and bird identification books. We met with our vehicle provider (Samuel), and he explained the how-to's of driving the (brand new!) vehicle. That was great, as we went through even how to change the tire(s) (we had 2 spares). However, thank goodness, we had zero issues with the vehicle, which also had a cooler in the back for items that needed to be kept cool.

The route we were given optimized our time and travel. Accommodations were great to good, though the latter is all that is available in some remote areas we went to (and likely impacted by our late planning). We had an amazing time in all the places we visited, and would not suggesting skipping any of them. We visited Windhoek, Kalahari, Fish Canyon, Klein Aus (wild horses), Sossusvlei, Swakopmund, Damaraland, Palmwag Etosha NP, and Waterberg. The 3 weeks went very fast, and we truly enjoyed the self driving aspect of the trip. We specifically enjoyed doing the self drive safari in Etosha, where we went where we wanted, as well as stayed as long as we wanted, in the park. Fish River Canyon, Sossusvlei (you gotta climb Big Daddy Dune, and then the rush of going down it!), and Kalahari also stood out for us.

Watchouts on the trip are the number and locations of gas stations, lots of unpaved roads (we enjoyed this actually), and poor cell/wifi coverage in remote areas (which is to be expected). We actually had some wifi coverage in our vehicle, which was really helpful!

We have already recommended Secret Namibia to friends who have inquired. The excellent service, the freedom of self driving, and excellent pricing, make them an easy referral for us!

"Secret Namibia organised a wonderful tour that met all our requirements."

The video call to set up what we wanted to do was really useful. All the arrangements, hotels and travel plans, were of a high standard. In country support was great. They even organised a new hotel when we didn’t drive far enough.

"Dream Honeymoon Thanks To Secret Namibia"

Our honeymoon in Namibia was a dream come true, thanks to Secret Namibia.

Everything was flawlessly planned, from the smooth transfers between our lodges to the personalized suggestions for the best activities.

Johan ensured we had a perfect balance of adventure and relaxation, whether it was exploring the dunes or unwinding in the peaceful, romantic settings.

The communication throughout was exceptional, making us feel completely at ease. After all the wedding events we really needed to just switch off and the whole trip was awesome- better than we could have imagined.

We’re already discussing returning for our anniversary as we've heard about a combined safari they offer that includes a visit to Vic falls.

We’ll definitely be booking with Secret Namibia again! Huge Thanks.

16 days Namibia safari planned in every details. Really good choice of lodges. Cars in perfect conditions. Strongly suggested

The Ultimate Safari Experience, Discover Namibia’s Most Exclusive and Comfortable Luxury Safaris

Discover the ultimate safari experience in Namibia, highlighting the exclusivity and comfort of luxury and all inclusive safaris with tailored itineraries.

10 Hidden Gems: Transformative Namibia Safaris Off the Beaten Path

Explore hidden gems in Namibia with off the beaten path destinations through self drive safaris or luxury safaris for an authentic adventure.

Green Getaways: Celebrating Conservation Month with Sustainable Safari Adventures

As Namibia’s golden horizons stretch endlessly, a new kind of journey awaits—one rooted in purpose and wild beauty. During Conservation Month, sustainable safari adventures offer more than just escape; they offer meaning. From tracking rhinos to staying in solar-powered lodges, every moment helps protect what makes Namibia so extraordinary. This is travel that gives back—to nature, to communities, and to you.

title: Luxury Namibia Safaris 2025 | Book Now with Secret Namibia
content:
Namibia Safari Holidays & Experiences

Bring out the inner adventurer! A Namibia Self-Drive Safari gives you the opportunity to explore the country at your own pace. With the vast emptiness comes spectacular landscapes and a sense of freedom that is to be found nowhere else.

SecretNamibia Luxury Safaris are the best way to experience the wonders of Namibia. With privacy, remoteness, comfort and sustainability at the forefront, these safaris are designed around you, the luxury traveller.

Do it in style! Cut out all the travelling time and head straight to the destinations. A Fly-In safari is perfect for those who are short on time. A new world awaits you over the incredible Namibian landscapes.

A Namibia family safari ticks all the boxes for a fantastic family vacation. An authentic African safari filled with game drives, bush walks and more. Family-friendly safaris cater to different age groups, rather than just adults.

All-Inclusive Safaris

Namibia is the ultimate all-inclusive safari destination. This is the perfect place to unwind in nature with luxury, remoteness, comfort and exclusivity guaranteed. Plus, with the superior service and amenities, rest assured that your every need will be met.

A Namibia family safari ticks all the boxes for a fantastic family vacation. An authentic African safari filled with game drives, bush walks and more. Family-friendly safaris cater to different age groups, rather than just adults.

More about our safari experiences

Discover the thrill of a Namibian safari. Encounter majestic wildlife, explore vast plains, and marvel at towering sand dunes and dramatic canyons. End your day beneath a sky full of stars, surrounded by nature’s wonders.

At Secret Namibia, we turn your safari dreams into reality. Based locally, our expert safari architects craft bespoke luxury adventures tailored to your unique preferences—from self-drive tours and family escapes to honeymoon getaways and exclusive fly-in safaris.

With a trusted network of guides, premium lodges, and insider access to Namibia’s hidden gems, we ensure every detail is flawlessly arranged. Enjoy seamless planning and 24/7 in-country support for a worry-free experience. Explore our sample itineraries and get in touch to start planning the adventure of a lifetime!

title: About Secret Namibia | Authentic Luxury Safari Specialists
content:
We believe that travel is more than just visiting new places; it's about creating unforgettable experiences that leave a lasting impression. As specialists in bespoke luxury travel, we excel in crafting tailor-made holidays to Southern Africa's most exclusive and awe-inspiring destinations. Our passion lies in transforming your travel dreams into reality, offering you a gateway to the extraordinary. We dedicate ourselves to curating journeys that not only meet but exceed your expectations, ensuring each trip is uniquely tailored to your desires and interests.

We believe that travel is more than just visiting new places; it's about creating unforgettable experiences that leave a lasting impression. As specialists in bespoke luxury travel, we excel in crafting tailor-made holidays to Southern Africa's most exclusive and awe-inspiring destinations. Our passion lies in transforming your travel dreams into reality, offering you a gateway to the extraordinary. We dedicate ourselves to curating journeys that not only meet but exceed your expectations, ensuring each trip is uniquely tailored to your desires and interests.

Secret Namibia was born from a simple idea: travelers deserve authentic, expertly crafted safari experiences designed by locals who know Namibia best. After seeing too many clients book through overseas tour operators with limited on-the-ground knowledge and inflated prices, we set out to create something different—a locally based safari company driven by passion, expertise, and a deep love for Africa.

Our team of dedicated safari architects, guides, and trusted suppliers share a common purpose: to craft unforgettable journeys that connect you with Namibia’s breathtaking landscapes, rich cultures, and iconic wildlife. Every experience is tailored with care, ensuring that your safari adventure is as unique and extraordinary as the country itself.

Nature conservation is at the heart of everything we do. We actively support organizations working to protect Namibia’s environment, wildlife, and local communities. By choosing Secret Namibia, you’re not just booking a safari—you’re contributing to preserving Africa’s natural heritage for generations to come.

Incredible destinations await

Incredible destinations await

Incredible destinations await

With unrivalled local expertise, personalised service, and a commitment to excellence, our team will go above and beyond to ensure your Namibian adventure exceeds every expectation. Let us share our love for this remarkable land and create the safari experience of a lifetime.

With unrivalled local expertise, personalised service, and a commitment to excellence, our team will go above and beyond to ensure your Namibian adventure exceeds every expectation. Let us share our love for this remarkable land and create the safari experience of a lifetime.

Personalised Travel, For You

At Secret Namibia, we understand that every traveler is unique. That's why we take the time to get to know you, to understand your passions, your preferences, and your desires. Our expert travel designers will work closely with you to craft a bespoke itinerary that reflects your individuality.

What sets us apart is our unwavering commitment to personalised service. We don't believe in one-size-fits-all solutions; instead, we'll work tirelessly to ensure that every aspect of your journey is tailored to your specific needs. From luxury private tours to exclusive access to the world's most sought-after experiences, we'll stop at nothing to create an unforgettable adventure that's truly yours alone.

At Secret Namibia, we believe that an exceptional safari experience starts with exceptional partnerships. That’s why we work exclusively with the top suppliers in the industry—those who share our commitment to the highest standards of quality, service, and sustainability.

Our trusted partners operate in Namibia’s most sought-after locations, offering unparalleled access to iconic landscapes and hidden gems. From luxurious lodges set in remote wilderness areas to exclusive camps offering one-of-a-kind wildlife encounters, every experience is designed to be truly unforgettable.

Equally important is their dedication to conservation and community development. We partner with suppliers who actively support local communities, protect endangered species, and preserve Namibia’s natural beauty for future generations.

By choosing Secret Namibia, you’re assured a safari adventure crafted with care, precision, and a shared passion for excellence—delivering experiences that go far beyond the ordinary.

Our attention to detail is what sets us apart.We listen to our clients, and plan their safaris centred around their needs.

Our dedicated safari architects are available 24/7. Each client receives a dedicated representative.

Your Journey Begins Here

Why wait to experience the extraordinary? Your next adventure is just a conversation away. Get in touch with us today, and let's begin the exciting process of designing your perfect luxury getaway. The world is waiting, and SecretNamibia is ready to take you there in unparalleled style and comfort.
